pageTitle: [gentoo-releng] Livecd building with catalyst - gentoo-releng - Gentoo Mailing List Archives
textBeforeTable: Replies gentoo-releng@g.o mailing list -- Lug Charleroi (Belgium) Gentoo Linux - HPPA port Lead / IPv6 team Guy Martin -- Cheers Also, I have exams soon (from 3 Jan to 17) and I'd like to finish this asap because that's the only way I can be in the release time. If not, I really must be implemented soon because building and testing livecd is _REALLY_ a long/hard/boring task for me. How is it done ? Is it yet implemented ? I just started to build new stages for hppa with catalyst but I don't see any doc for livecd building. Hello,  20031216150455.1f6ace1e.gmsoft@gentoo.org Message-Id: Tue, 16 Dec 2003 08:05:06 Date: [gentoo-releng] Livecd building with catalyst Subject: gentoo-releng@g.o To: Guy Martin <gmsoft@g.o> From: Gentoo Archives: gentoo-releng gentoo-releng All Archives Home Toggle navigation Archives Infra Status
